cards.question:
What are the four base keys of the registry?
What do they contain/represent?
cards.answer:
HKLM (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE): general system config (think /etc)
HKCC (HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG): loaded dynamically on every boot
HKU (HKEY_USERS): "array" of users and all relevant data
HKCU (HKEY_CURRENT_USER): like HKU, but only the currently logged-in user
